ISSUE.TITLE: Vertex - Error:Cannot connect to host prod.vertexprotocol-backend.com:443 ssl:default
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug Writes an error: ``` Error:Cannot connect to host prod.vertexprotocol-backe nd.com:443 ssl:default [Name or service not known] ``` ### Steps to reproduce According to the API documents, he has a completely different address for working with web sockets: Mainnet: Websocket: wss://gateway.prod.vertexprotocol.com/v1/ws REST: https://gateway.prod.vertexprotocol.com/v1 Docks https://docs.vertexprotocol.com/developer-resources/api/gateway ### Release version 1.25 ### Type of installation Source ### Attach required files _No response_
